name: Nelson J. RODRIGUEZ, Administrator for the Estate of Josefa Rodriguez v. EPISCOPAL LONG TERM CARE. Petition of Episcopal Long Term Care
name_abbreviation: Rodriguez v. Episcopal Long Term Care

parties: Nelson J. RODRIGUEZ, Administrator for the Estate of Josefa Rodriguez v. EPISCOPAL LONG TERM CARE. Petition of Episcopal Long Term Care.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of April, 2010, the Application for Consolidation is GRANTED, the Application for Relief and the Application for Relief for Correct Designation of its Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED, and the Application to Strike New Matter is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
993 A.2d 870
Nelson J. RODRIGUEZ, Administrator for the Estate of Josefa Rodriguez v. EPISCOPAL LONG TERM CARE. Petition of Episcopal Long Term Care.
No. 144 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 19, 2010.
